item.title: 全球策略师因国防基金而大胆做多欧元
item.description: 一些全球策略师建议做多欧元兑美元，理由是共同货币和该地区在努力促进支出的过程中前景有所改善。【原文：Some global strategists are recommending going long the euro against greenback, citing an improved outlook for the common currency and the region amid efforts to boost spending.】

item.title: Forge Nano 寻求估值高达 9 亿美元的融资
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，2013 年从科罗拉多大学博尔德分校分离出来的材料科学初创公司 Forge Nano Inc.【原文：Forge Nano Inc., a materials science startup spun out of the University of Colorado Boulder in 2013, is seeking to raise new funding at a valuation of as much as $900 million, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 乐观情绪升温 中国股市或因人工智能打破人大首日跌幅
item.description: 随着中国官员齐聚一堂，举行本年度最大规模的政治集会，股票投资者乐观地认为，这一次将有所不同。【原文：As Chinese officials gather for the biggest political huddle of the year, equity investors are optimistic this time will be different.】

item.title: 关税减免的暗示令亚洲股市开盘走势不稳：市场综述
item.description: 在美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克暗示特朗普政府可能收回引发全球市场大跌的部分关税之后，亚洲股市将出现更多波动。【原文：Stocks in Asia are set for more volatility after US Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick suggested the Trump administration may walk back some tariffs that sparked a global selloff in markets.】

item.title: 谷歌敦促特朗普司法部改变拆分公司的做法
item.description: 据熟悉相关讨论的人士透露，谷歌正在敦促唐纳德-特朗普总统的司法部官员以国家安全为由，放弃拆分这家搜索引擎公司。【原文：Google is urging officials at President Donald Trump’s Justice Department to back away from a push to break up the search engine company, citing national security concerns, according to people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 日本企业加大对美出口以抢占关税先机
item.description: 日本公司正在美国囤积货物，以降低唐纳德-特朗普总统在打击中国、加拿大和墨西哥之后可能征收的任何关税的影响。【原文：Japanese companies are stockpiling goods in the US to lower the impact from any tariffs President Donald Trump might levy after hitting China, Canada and Mexico.】

item.title: 彭博投资大会首日的五大收获
item.description: 以下是周二在纽约举行的彭博投资会议第一天的五大要点。单击此处查看我们的 TOPLive 博客：【原文：Here are five key takeaways from the first day of the Bloomberg Invest conference in New York on Tuesday. Click here for our TOPLive blog:】

item.title: 铝关税问题让美国制造商陷入困境
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对加拿大和墨西哥供应的铝征收进口关税后，北美的铝行业和买家都在争相了解业务将受到怎样的影响。【原文：North America’s aluminum industry and buyers are scrambling to figure out how business will be affected after US President Donald Trump imposed import duties on Canadian and Mexican supplies.】

item.title: 卢特尼克称特朗普考虑减免部分墨西哥和加拿大关税
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周二表示，特朗普政府可能最快于明天宣布对北美自由贸易协定所涵盖的墨西哥和加拿大商品实行关税减免的途径。【原文：The Trump administration could announce a pathway for tariff relief on Mexican and Canadian goods covered by North America’s free trade agreement as soon as tomorrow, Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said Tuesday.】

item.title: 加拿大主要股指受关税影响回落，抹去 2025 年涨幅
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对从加拿大进口的商品征收关税后，加拿大的主要股指失去了今年早些时候的所有涨幅，这对与美国有业务往来的公司和对经济疲软敏感的行业造成了压力。【原文：Canada’s primary stock index lost all of its gains from earlier in the year after US President Donald Trump put tariffs on imports from Canada, weighing on companies with US exposure and industries sensitive to economic weakness.】

item.title: CrowdStrike 盈利前景令人失望，业绩下滑
item.description: CrowdStrike Holding Inc. 的股价在这家网络安全公司发布了一份不如预期的盈利展望后下跌，这表明该公司可能仍在努力从去年导致全球数百万台电脑崩溃的缺陷软件更新中恢复过来。【原文：CrowdStrike Holding Inc.’s shares fell after the cybersecurity company issued a worse-than-expected earnings outlook, signaling that it may still be struggling to recover from a flawed software update that crashed millions of computers globally last year.】

item.title: Iconiq 和 Kleiner Perkins 以 10 亿美元估值支持保险索赔初创公司 Assured
item.description: 据知情人士透露，专注于利用人工智能实现保险理赔自动化的初创公司 Assured Insurance Technologies Inc.【原文：Assured Insurance Technologies Inc., a startup focused on automating insurance claims using artificial intelligence, raised equity funding in a round that values the company at about $1 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普的一连串关税将使天价食品成本进一步攀升
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统对美国食品征收的关税即将到来，这将伤害那些在多年的供应链中断之后已经在与高昂的杂货成本作斗争的消费者。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariffs are coming for American food, hurting consumers already contending with sky-high grocery costs after years of supply-chain disruptions.】

item.title: 关税如何运作？谁支付、谁征收及其他
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对美国最大贸易伙伴的商品征收惩罚性关税，震撼了经济和市场。到目前为止，他已对大多数加拿大和墨西哥进口商品征收 25% 的关税，并将对中国进口商品的征税提高到 20%。根据耶鲁大学预算实验室（Budget Lab at Yale University）的数据，这些举措使美国的进口关税达到了自1943年以来的最高平均水平。以下是关税的工作原理— 包括谁在实际支付关税以及关税的影响。【原文：US President Donald Trump has rattled economies and markets with punitive tariffs on goods from the nation’s largest trade partners. So far he’s implemented 25% duties on most Canadian and Mexican imports and raised levies on those from China to 20%. The moves bring American import duties to their highest average level since 1943, according to the Budget Lab at Yale University, and Trump has indicated more hikes may follow. Here’s how tariffs work — including who actually pays them and how the r】

item.title: 美联储主席威廉姆斯称关税可能导致美国物价上涨
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）表示，他预计关税将促进通胀，但强调经济将如何应对唐纳德-特朗普总统的征税存在很大的不确定性。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams said he anticipates tariffs will contribute to inflation, but emphasized there is a lot of uncertainty about how the economy will respond to President Donald Trump’s levies.】

item.title: 创纪录的回调推动开市股大跌
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战至少暂时浇灭了个人投资者对美国股市的乐观情绪，在周二开盘后引发了创纪录的退市潮。【原文：President Donald Trump’s trade war at least temporarily dashed individual investors’ optimism about the US stock market, setting-off a record setting stampede for the exits just after Tuesday’s opening bell.】

item.title: 摩根大通交易员看淡美股，预计关税将带来痛苦
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对全球各国发起一系列关税行动，摩根大通公司的交易台正准备应对美国股市扩大跌幅，因为征税会对美国国内和海外的经济增长造成压力。【原文：As President Donald Trump unleashes a salvo of tariffs on nations around the globe, the trading desk at JPMorgan Chase & Co. is bracing for US equities to extend losses as levies weigh on growth at home and overseas.】

item.title: 加密货币储备计划的反弹引发对其前景的怀疑
item.description: 关于特朗普政府将如何执行总统的加密货币战略储备计划，华盛顿和加密货币市场充斥着许多疑问。【原文：There are many questions swirling around Washington and the crypto market regarding how exactly the Trump administration will attempt to execute on the president’s plan for a strategic cryptocurrency reserve.】

item.title: 特朗普的能源关税将引发石油流向的重新划分
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）全面征收关税，通常纵横交错的全球石油和燃料供应线即将重新划分。【原文：The world’s supply lines for cargoes of oil and fuel, which typically criss-cross the globe, are about to get redrawn thanks to US President Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs.】

item.title: X Lender Diameter 称平台利润高于市场预期
item.description: Diameter Capital Partners 是首批收购埃隆-马斯克收购 X 公司债务的公司之一，该公司的联合创始人表示，这家社交媒体公司的盈利能力超出了市场预期。【原文：The cofounder of Diameter Capital Partners, one the first firms to snap up debt tied to Elon Musk’s buyout of X, says that the social media company was more profitable than the market was accounting for.】

item.title: 股市暴跌，VIX 期货曲线发出窘迫信号
item.description: S&P 500 指数的下跌刺激了短期套期保值需求，使 Cboe VIX 期货曲线出现罕见的反转。【原文：A rout in the S&P 500 Index has boosted demand for short-term hedges, flipping the Cboe VIX Futures curve into a rare inversion.】

item.title: 纽约市财政状况不断恶化，主要指标将跌至 11 年来的最低点
item.description: 衡量纽约市财政健康状况的一项关键指标正在恶化，这加重了这座美国最大城市的财政忧虑，因为唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府可能会削减数十亿美元的财政预算。【原文：A key measure of New York City’s fiscal health is deteriorating, adding to the largest US city’s financial worries in the face of billions of dollars in possible cuts from President Donald Trump’s administration.】

item.title: 埃利奥特提名菲利普斯 66 董事，斗争升级
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）因未能与菲利普斯 66 能源集团的领导层就改善业绩的途径达成协议，正与该公司展开代理权争夺战。【原文：Elliott Investment Management is heading toward a proxy battle with Phillips 66 after failing to reach an agreement with the energy group’s leadership on a path to improving performance.】

item.title: 调查显示美国在法投资者十年来最悲观
item.description: 根据法国美国商会和贝恩公司（Bain & Company）的一项年度调查，由于政局不稳以及预算和税收缺乏透明度，美国投资者对法国的看法是十年来最悲观的。【原文：US investors in France are the most pessimistic in a decade due to political instability as well as a lack of budget and tax visibility, according to an annual survey by the American Chamber of Commerce in France and Bain & Company.】

item.title: Blackstone 的 Gray 看涨数据中心支出
item.description: Blackstone Inc.总裁 Jon Gray 依然看好数据中心在为人工智能和日常生活提供动力方面的作用。【原文：Blackstone Inc. President Jon Gray remains bullish on the role of data centers to power artificial intelligence and daily life.】

item.title: 特朗普关税贸易 "穷途末路"，黄金价格扰动缓解
item.description: 随着实物市场紧缺状况的缓解，黄金价格的剧烈波动正在消退，这表明将金条运往美国的热潮可能已经结束。【原文：Gold’s extreme price dislocations are fading as tightness in the physical market eases, indicating a rush to ship bullion to America may have run its course.】

item.title: Blockstream 为比特币借贷基金获得数十亿美元资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，比特币开发商Blockstream公司已获得一笔数十亿美元的投资，用于推出三只基金，其中两只将用于加密借贷。【原文：Bitcoin developer Blockstream Corp. has secured a multibillion-dollar investment to launch three funds, including two that will enable crypto lending, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 加密货币 "另类季 "可能在市场整体低迷中永远消失
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）连任时，加密货币从历史高点迅速回落，在此过程中，一种更可靠的交易模式似乎变得不那么可靠了。【原文：One of the more dependable trading patterns in crypto appears to have become less reliable during the swift drawdown from the all-time highs reached amid the exuberance around the re-election of Donald Trump.】
